summary: Comprehensive testing of Daily Rewards, Gold Certificates, Health Hub, K9 Credentials, Virtual Pet, and Training Center. All backend APIs working correctly (24/24 tests passed). Frontend pages functioning properly. One bug identified: DailyRewardCard component imported but NOT rendered on Dashboard.

ui_bugs.issue: DailyRewardCard component is imported (line 40) but NOT rendered anywhere in the Dashboard component. The Daily Rewards feature is missing from the dashboard UI.
ui_bugs.fix_suggestion: Add <DailyRewardCard onClaim={fetchData} /> to the Dashboard render, preferably in the right column above or below the ReferralBanner

endpoints_tested: GET /api/daily-reward/status - Returns streak info, claim status, next reward
POST /api/daily-reward/claim - Successfully claims daily reward, awards tokens
daily_rewards_api.test_result: Claimed Day 1 reward, received 1 token, streak updated to 1

endpoints_tested: GET /api/health/{dog_id} - Returns health records for dog
health_hub.frontend: Health Hub page loads correctly with Overview, Records, Vets tabs

components_verified: GoldCertificate.jsx - Gold certificate component with preview, download, share
Achievements page shows Preview/Download Gold Cert buttons

endpoints_tested: GET /api/k9/credentials - Returns tier info, completed lessons, credential ID
k9_credentials.frontend: K9 Credentials page shows professional credential card, tier progression, locked ranks

endpoints_tested: POST /api/virtual-pet/play - Plays with pet, gains XP
virtual_pet.frontend: Animated Tamagotchi-style K9 pet with 4 activity tabs (Care/Play/Exercise/Train)

training_center.frontend: Visual lesson cards with images, category cards with gradients

achievements.frontend: Stats cards, empty state, upcoming achievements section

action_items: FIX: Add DailyRewardCard component to Dashboard.jsx render - component is imported but not used
Suggested location: Add to the right column in Dashboard, above or after ReferralBanner component
critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard.jsx line 40: `import { DailyRewardCard } from '@/components/DailyReward'` - imported but never used in render
The DailyRewardCard component exists and is fully functional (components/DailyReward.jsx) but missing from Dashboard UI

success_rate.frontend: 95% (all pages working, 1 component missing from Dashboard)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 10 features verified working. Backend APIs for daily rewards, health hub, vets, achievements, k9 credentials all pass tests. Frontend pages render correctly. KEY BUG: DailyRewardCard imported but not rendered on Dashboard - needs to be added to Dashboard.jsx render.
